org.apache.hcatalog.hbase.snapshot
Class RevisionManagerEndpointClient

Object
  RevisionManagerEndpointClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, RevisionManager
public class RevisionManagerEndpointClient
extends Object
implements RevisionManager, Configurable

This class is nothing but a delegate for the enclosed proxy, which is created upon setting the configuration.
